channel.title: Official Kings Of Chaos Thread. Players Only Please
channel.description:
Ok,
I used to play this game a long time ago, and decided that since I'm bored, I'll start again. If you don't play, goto Kingsofchaos.com and register.
Now, here's what this post is for, post your unique links. It's a system. We post our unique links, and we all click on them for each other, getting us all more untrained soldiers. I'll add them to the list as you post. Even if you don't play, clicking on these would be appreciated.
The List.
Buzzy777- [url=http://beta.kingsofchaos.com/recruit.php?uniqid=wt73x27j][/url]

item.title: Official Kings Of Chaos Thread. Players Only Please
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

That’s the name!

My friend showed me it when I used to play, and forgot the name, that’s what I modeled this off of. Do you remember the link?

Read full topic
item.source: Official Kings Of Chaos Thread. Players Only Please

item.title: Official Kings Of Chaos Thread. Players Only Please
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Oh my God, I used to waste so much time on this. I’d do it before school, after school, during school, in the middle of the night. I had to go on every 5 hours or so to buy like a trebuchet (?) or some defense item, so I’d have no cash and no one would want ot attack me. Oh God what a waste of time.

My friend was less than 100 ranked defense, and I was close behind him. I had a good couple thousand soldiers.

Buzzy, do you use Wildfire? I used to do that until my fingers hurt.

Read full topic
item.source: Official Kings Of Chaos Thread. Players Only Please
